title: Monster Bash - Can help me???
content:
hi!
someone can give me file_id.diz for monster bash 1, 2 and 3? i need to can play this game! xD
tanks very much!

send to gajocoolman@hotmail.com, please! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-potter.gif[/img]

title: Re: Monster Bash - Can help me???
content:
Doesn't it work if you just create the file yourself? I don't think any games actually check the contents of the file, just that it exists. Try something like

echo hello > file_id.diz

Then run the game and see if that works.

title: Re: Monster Bash - Can help me???
content: Sorry, but... i don't understand... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]  you can help me better, please???? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

title: Re: Monster Bash - Can help me???
content:
No, it won't work - MB actually checks its file_id.diz file. While I can't give you the file_id.diz file, you can extract it yourself from the data files using Wombat.----------------------
Support (at least partially) for 27 games!
Check out the progress of Wombat Game Tools [url=http://student.ci.qut.edu.au/~n4738667/index.php?section=wombatwip]here[/url]
